content.question: Which of the following best characterizes the authorâ€™s thesis in the passage?

choices.label: Professional success usually requires overcoming multiple obstacles.
The encouragement of peers is often more valuable than formal education.
Identifying appropriate role models is worthwhile even if doing so is challenging.
Culinary schools must broaden their curricula to reflect the interests of their students.

content.answer: Identifying appropriate role models is worthwhile even if doing so is challenging.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify and describe the overarching thesis of an argument, and any indication it provides of the argument's structure.
